MOVI REG0 IMED(6)
0001  00  0000000110
0001000000000110

MOVI REG1 IMED(5)
0001  01  0000000101
0001010000000101

XCHG REG0 REG1
0010  00   01 00000000
0010000100000000

ADDI REG0 REG0 IMED(8)
0101  00   00  00000010
0101000000000010

ADDI REG2 REG1 IMED(3)
0101  10   01  00000011
0101100100000011

ORI  REG3 REG0 IMED
1000  11   00  00000000
1000110000000000

ADD  REG0 REG0 REG1
1001  00   00   01  000000
1001000001000000

SUB  REG0 REG1 REG2
1010 00   01   10   000000
1010000110000000

SUBI REG0 REG0 IMED(-8)
0110 00   00   11111000
0110000011111000
